alert.note: Alert for Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 10:46PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jones, central Craven, Onslow, southeastern Duplin, western Carteret and western Pamlico Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1046 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Richlands to near Verona. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New Bern, Havelock, Wallace, New River Station, Pumpkin Center, Piney Green, Half Moon, Camp Lejeune Center, James City, Trent Woods, River Bend, Stella, Phillips Crossroads, Richlands, Maysville, Askins, Catherine Lake, Kellum and Cypress Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Duplin; Inland Onslow; Jones; Northern Craven; Pamlico; Southern Craven
